entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
